targets.query: from(bucket: "${INFLUX_BUCKET}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "modbus" and r._field == "GoodCount") |> last()
from(bucket: "${INFLUX_BUCKET}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "modbus" and r._field == "ScrapCount") |> last()

from(bucket: "${INFLUX_BUCKET}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "modbus" and r._field == "Quality") |> last() |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 100.0 }))
from(bucket: "${INFLUX_BUCKET}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "modbus" and r._field == "RUN")

from(bucket: "${INFLUX_BUCKET}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "modbus" and (r._field == "Current_pct" or r._field == "Vibration_pct"))
